00001 #ifndef GVERTEX_H_
00002 #define GVERTEX_H_
00003 
00004 #include "utils/global.h"
00005 #include <vector>
00006 #include "utils/serialization.h"
00007 #include "GMessageBuffer.h"
00008 #include "basic/Vertex.h" //for DefaultHash
00009 using namespace std;
00010 
00011 //GEdge
00012 template <class KeyT, class MessageT, class EValT>
00013 class GEdge {
00014 public:
00015     typedef MessageT MessageType;
00016 
00017     KeyT id;
00018     EValT eval;
00019 
00020     void relay(MessageT& msg)
00021     {
00022         //to process msg into a new value
00023         //relay is done on sender-side if deg<tau
00024         //otherwise, done on receiver-side
00025         //here, the default implementation is to do nothing to msg
00026     }
00027 
00028     friend ibinstream& operator<<(ibinstream& m, const GEdge& e)
00029     {
00030         m << e.id;
00031         m << e.eval;
00032         return m;
00033     }
00034 
00035     friend obinstream& operator>>(obinstream& m, GEdge& e)
00036     {
00037         m >> e.id;
00038         m >> e.eval;
00039         return m;
00040     }
00041 };
00042 
00043 template <class KeyT, class MessageT>
00044 class DefaultGEdge {
00045 public:
00046     typedef MessageT MessageType;
00047 
00048     KeyT id;
00049 
00050     void relay(MessageT& msg)
00051     {
00052         //to process msg into a new value
00053         //relay is done on sender-side if deg<tau
00054         //otherwise, done on receiver-side
00055         //here, the default implementation is to do nothing to msg
00056     }
00057 
00058     friend ibinstream& operator<<(ibinstream& m, const DefaultGEdge& e)
00059     {
00060         m << e.id;
00061         return m;
00062     }
00063 
00064     friend obinstream& operator>>(obinstream& m, DefaultGEdge& e)
00065     {
00066         m >> e.id;
00067         return m;
00068     }
00069 };

00071 //--------------------------
00072 //GVertex
00073 template <class KeyT, class ValueT, class MessageT, class EdgeT = DefaultGEdge<KeyT, MessageT>, class HashT = DefaultHash<KeyT> >
00074 class GVertex {
00075 public:
00076     typedef KeyT KeyType;
00077     typedef ValueT ValueType;
00078     typedef EdgeT EdgeType;
00079     typedef MessageT MessageType;
00080     typedef HashT HashType;
00081     typedef vector<MessageType> MessageContainer;
00082     typedef typename MessageContainer::iterator MessageIter;
00083     typedef GVertex<KeyT, ValueT, MessageT, EdgeT, HashT> GVertexT;
00084     typedef MessageBuffer<GVertexT> MessageBufT;
00085 
00086     typedef vector<EdgeT> EdgeContainer;
00087     typedef hash_map<int, EdgeContainer> NeighborTable;
00088     typedef typename NeighborTable::iterator TableIter;
00089 
00090     KeyT id;
00091     void* _neighbors;
00092     bool tag; //whether neighbors->machines already
00093     ValueT _value;
00094     bool active;
00095 
00096     GVertex()
00097     {
00098         tag = false;
00099         active = true;
00100         _neighbors = new EdgeContainer;
00101     }
00102 
00103     ~GVertex()
00104     {
00105         if (tag)
00106             delete (vector<int>*)_neighbors;
00107         else
00108             delete (EdgeContainer*)_neighbors;
00109     }
00110 
00111     EdgeContainer& neighbors()
00112     {
00113         return *((EdgeContainer*)_neighbors);
00114     }
00115 
00116     vector<int>& machines()
00117     {
00118         return *((vector<int>*)_neighbors);
00119     }
00120 
00121     void split(NeighborTable& table)
00122     {
00123         //set the empty table with local_neighbor info to sent
00124         //do the neighbors->machines conversion
00125         tag = true;
00126         EdgeContainer& nbs = neighbors();
00127         HashT hash;
00128         for (int i = 0; i < nbs.size(); i++) {
00129             int worker = hash(nbs[i].id);
00130             table[worker].push_back(nbs[i]);
00131         }
00132         delete (EdgeContainer*)_neighbors;
00133         _neighbors = new vector<int>;
00134         vector<int>& macs = machines();
00135         for (TableIter it = table.begin(); it != table.end(); it++) {
00136             macs.push_back(it->first);
00137         }
00138     }
00139 
00140     void broadcast(const MessageT& field)
00141     {
00142         GMessageBuffer<GVertexT>* gmsgbuf = (GMessageBuffer<GVertexT>*)global_message_buffer;
00143         if (tag) {
00144             vector<int>& macs = machines();
00145             gmsgbuf->add_gmessage(this, field);
00146         } else {
00147             EdgeContainer& nbs = neighbors();
00148             for (int i = 0; i < nbs.size(); i++) {
00149                 EdgeT nb = nbs[i];
00150                 MessageT msg = field;
00151                 nb.relay(msg);
00152                 gmsgbuf->add_message(nb.id, msg);
00153             }
00154         }
00155     }
00156 
00157     //-----------
00158 
00159     virtual void compute(MessageContainer& messages) = 0;
00160     inline ValueT& value()
00161     {
00162         return _value;
00163     }
00164     inline const ValueT& value() const
00165     {
00166         return _value;
00167     }
00168 
00169     inline bool operator<(const GVertexT& rhs) const
00170     {
00171         return id < rhs.id;
00172     }
00173     inline bool operator==(const GVertexT& rhs) const
00174     {
00175         return id == rhs.id;
00176     }
00177     inline bool operator!=(const GVertexT& rhs) const
00178     {
00179         return id != rhs.id;
00180     }
00181 
00182     inline bool is_active()
00183     {
00184         return active;
00185     }
00186     inline void activate()
00187     {
00188         active = true;
00189     }
00190     inline void vote_to_halt()
00191     {
00192         active = false;
00193     }
00194 
00195     friend ibinstream& operator<<(ibinstream& m, const GVertexT& v)
00196     { //just for using by sync_graph()
00197         m << v.id;
00198         m << v._value;
00199         m << *((EdgeContainer*)v._neighbors);
00200         m << v.tag;
00201         m << v.active;
00202         return m;
00203     }
00204 
00205     friend obinstream& operator>>(obinstream& m, GVertexT& v)
00206     { //just for using by sync_graph()
00207         m >> v.id;
00208         m >> v._value;
00209         m >> *((EdgeContainer*)v._neighbors);
00210         m >> v.tag;
00211         m >> v.active;
00212         return m;
00213     }
00214 };
00215 
00216 #endif /* GVERTEX_H_ */
